item.title: Brent add a quote by Joey Comeau
item.description: "I feel the way bank robbers must feel before they go out on that last job that ends up getting them all killed. That is to say, optimistic." -- Joey Comeau

item.title: Brent add a quote by Alexander Maksik
item.description: "Everything can change, but only with abandon." -- Alexander Maksik

item.title: Brent add a quote by Alexander Maksik
item.description: "Anyone you can fool isn't worth loving." -- Alexander Maksik

item.title: Brent add a quote by Alexander Maksik
item.description: "Cowards spend their lives alone. Either with people who can't hurt them, or with no one at all." -- Alexander Maksik

item.title: Brent add a quote by Amelia Gray
item.description: "You lose everything you love in the order in which you love it." -- Amelia Gray

item.title: Brent add a quote by David Mitchell
item.description: "A half-read book is a half-finished love affair." -- David Mitchell

item.title: Brent add a quote by David Lynch
item.description: "I hate slick and pretty things. I prefer mistakes and accidents. Which is why I like things like cuts and bruises - they're like little flowers. I've always said that if you have a name for something, like 'cut' or 'bruise,' people will automatically be disturbed by it. But when you see the same thing in nature, and you don't know what it is, it can be very beautiful." -- David Lynch

item.title: Brent add a quote by David Mitchell
item.description: "My life amounts to no more than one drop in a limitless ocean. Yet what is any ocean, but a multitude of drops?" -- David Mitchell

item.title: Brent add a quote by David Mitchell
item.description: "You say you're 'depressed' - all i see is resilience. You are allowed to feel messed up and inside out. It doesn't mean you're defective - it just means you're human." -- David Mitchell

item.title: Brent add a quote by J.R. Salamanca
item.description: "I suppose if you want a love that will last forever you have to be in love with sorrow." -- J.R. Salamanca

item.title: Brent add a quote by Ron Currie Jr.
item.description: "Don't repackage your fear and try to sell it to me as indifference." -- Ron Currie Jr.

item.title: Brent add a quote by Ron Currie Jr.
item.description: "By the way, don’t ever let someone convince you that there’s anything — and I mean anything — good about dying. There is nothing redemptive in decline and decay. The hard candy of necrosis has no nougat center where the human spirit prevails over all. Death is not a ‘journey,’ a ‘part of life,’ a ‘release from suffering,’ or any other such bullshit euphemism we employ to comfort and delude ourselves. And while we’re on the subject, no one ‘passes on’ or ‘passes away,’ either, and they sure as fuck don’t ‘cross over.’ They die, and then they start to swell and stink in the very moment." -- Ron Currie Jr.

item.title: Brent add a quote by Raymond Carver
item.description: "Woke up this morning with a terrific urge to lie in bed all day and read." -- Raymond Carver

item.title: Brent add a quote by Blake Butler
item.description: "DAYS ARE WEEKS AND WEEKS ARE DAYS INSIDE YOU" -- Blake Butler

item.title: Brent add a quote by Emerson, Ralph Waldo
item.description: "I cannot remember the books I've read any more than the meals I have eaten; even so, they have made me." -- Emerson, Ralph Waldo

item.title: Brent add a quote by Mira Gonzalez
item.description: "it hurt us both when i held you from behind because I couldn't change the weather with my arms" -- Mira Gonzalez
